Nandamuri Balakrishna’s film, Daaku Maharaaj, continues to engage audiences with impressive box office collections, particularly benefiting from the Sankranthi holidays.

T.O.P Addresses The Scathing Criticism For His Acting In "Squid Game - Koreaboo
summary:
T.O.P Addresses The Scathing Criticism For His Acting In 'Squid Game'

Date: 4 hours ago | Source: koreaboo.com

On January 15, former BIGBANG member T.O.P gave his first media interview in eleven years, addressing criticism he received for his performance in the Netflix series 'Squid Game 2'.

  • T.O.P portrayed Thanos, a rapper with drug issues, in 'Squid Game 2'.
  • His performance was met with harsh criticism from various media outlets upon the series' release on December 26.
  • He stated that the character is meant to be a caricature and not a typical cool rapper.
  • T.O.P expressed that filming scenes involving drug addiction was personally challenging.

“I have to endure everything and accept it humbly.” — T.O.P

“Thanos was not supposed to be a flashy or cool rapper, but a failed, hip-hop loser character.” — T.O.P

T.O.P's portrayal of Thanos aimed to reflect a ridiculous and pathetic character, contributing to the comic relief in the dark narrative of the series.
newTitle: T.O.P Responds to Criticism of His Acting in 'Squid Game 2'

title: Sudip Pandey, Bhojpuri cinema heartthrob, dies of heart attack - Hindustan Times
summary:
Bhojpuri Actor Sudip Pandey Passes Away from Heart Attack

Date: Jan 16, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Sudip Pandey, a prominent figure in Bhojpuri cinema, died of a heart attack on Wednesday morning. His unexpected death has shocked fans and family alike.

  • Sudip Pandey died due to a heart attack at the age of 30.
  • He passed away in Mumbai at approximately 11 AM.
  • Pandey was known for both acting and producing in the Bhojpuri film industry since 2007.
  • He gained fame through films such as Pyar Mein, Balwa, and Dharti.
  • His death has elicited emotional responses from fans on social media.
“RIP...may your soul rest in peace,” a fan wrote on social media. “Gone too soon,” another social media user expressed.

Pandey's career achievements have left a significant mark on Bhojpuri cinema, and he will be remembered for his contributions.
newTitle: Bhojpuri Actor Sudip Pandey Passes Away from Heart Attack

title: Netflix announces 2025 Tamil movie slate - 123telugu
summary:
Netflix Announces 2025 Tamil Movie Slate

Published on: Jan 16, 2025 2:58 am IST

On Sankranthi, Netflix announced its Tamil movie slate for the year 2025, adding to the previously announced Telugu releases.

  • Vidaamuyarchi
  • Good Bad Ugly
  • Thug Life
  • Retro
  • Bison
  • Dragon
  • Kaantha
  • Perusu
  • Untitled Pradeep Ranganathan film

The Tamil films will also stream in Telugu, Malayalam, and Kannada. However, Retro, Bison, Dragon, and Perusu will not be available in Hindi.

Official streaming dates will be announced a few weeks after their theatrical releases. Stay tuned for more updates.
newTitle: Netflix Announces 2025 Tamil Movie Slate

title: Coldplay and Ed Sheeran: Why global stars are now hitting India - BBC.com
summary:
Coldplay and Ed Sheeran: Why global stars are now hitting India

Date: [Insert Date] Source: BBC Newsbeat

As global music stars begin to recognize the potential of the Indian market, many are scheduling performances in the country after years of neglect. Coldplay and Ed Sheeran are set to bring their performances to India, reflecting a growing demand for live music.

  • Coldplay will perform in Ahmedabad, expecting over 100,000 attendees each night.
  • Ticketing platform BookMyShow reports an 18% growth in live music demand in India for 2024.
  • The Indian music industry is projected to grow from 19 billion rupees in 2021 to 37 billion rupees by 2026.
  • Local artists view performances from global stars as opportunities for greater visibility and collaboration.
“To have that experience in our own country, it’s really cool to see that it’s happening more and more,” - Anoushka Maskey

The trend of international artists touring India may pave the way for further cultural exchange and increase opportunities for homegrown talent.
newTitle: Coldplay and Ed Sheeran: Why global stars are now hitting India

title: Diljit Dosanjh Looks Helpless In Jail, Reads A Newspaper In New Photos From His Upcoming Movie - News18
summary:
Diljit Dosanjh Looks Helpless In Jail, Reads A Newspaper In New Photos From His Upcoming Movie

Publication Date: January 15, 2025, Source: News18

Punjabi superstar Diljit Dosanjh has shared new pictures from his upcoming movie ‘Punjab '95’. The film relates to the life of human rights activist Jaswant Singh Khalra, showcasing Diljit in various emotional scenes.

  • The film highlights the struggles of Khalra amid the turbulent period in Punjab.
  • The teaser for the film is set to release on January 17, 2025.
  • Both ‘Punjab '95’ and Kangana Ranaut’s ‘Emergency’ touch upon common themes related to Indian history.
  • Khalra was noted for gathering evidence against police atrocities during the 1980s.
  • The Central Board of Film Certification proposed multiple cuts due to the sensitive subject matter.
“The film captures the essence of a dark time in our history and aims to shed light on it.” - Diljit Dosanjh

This film echoes the significant historical events that shaped Punjab and reflects on justice and human rights.
newTitle: Diljit Dosanjh Looks Helpless In Jail, Read Newspaper in New Movie Photos

title: Priyanka Chopra Jonas expresses heartbreak as Palisades fire wreaks havoc across Los Angeles: 'While I’m - TOI Etimes
summary:
Priyanka Chopra Jonas expresses heartbreak as Palisades fire wreaks havoc across Los Angeles: 'While I’m deeply grateful for my family’s safety, my heart is heavy'

Publication Date: N/A Source: Times of India

The Palisades Fire in Los Angeles is causing widespread destruction, forcing thousands to evacuate and claiming lives. Priyanka Chopra Jonas expresses her sorrow for the affected community while urging support for relief efforts.

  • The Palisades Fire represents one of the most destructive wildfires in Los Angeles history, with significant damage reported.
  • Priyanka Chopra Jonas called for support for affected families and praised the efforts of first responders and volunteers.
  • The fire has displaced nearly 200,000 residents and resulted in the tragic loss of at least 24 lives.
  • Priyanka highlighted organizations to support like the California Fire Foundation and the American Red Cross.
“My heart is heavy for LA. While I’m deeply grateful for my family’s safety, so many of our friends, colleagues, and fellow Angelenos have lost so much.”

The community faces a long recovery process following the devastation caused by the fire, with an increasing need for aiding those impacted.
newTitle: Priyanka Chopra Jonas Heartbroken Over Destructive Palisades Fire in Los Angeles
